Desc.entry: Hosts mother and toddler playgroup, dancing classes, easy and modern sequence dances/tea dances (see separate entry), evening dances, ladies group and social evenings. Hall available for hire (see separate entry). A registered charity.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Sun 9am-11pm (opening hours); 3rd Mon in the month at 7.30pm (Council Meeting)

category.entry: COMMUNITY CENTRES AND ASSOCIATIONS - POSTAL DISTRICT 6
